task.summary: Default task
Refactored events.py to simplify code (and correct docstrings)
Added renderer.py module that loads game images
Replaced Renderer class with functions to resolve dependencies
Added the splash screen with the fade effect
Connected splash menu to main menu via event-driven messaging
Replaced separate menu and scene loading functions with single
Added coin animation to images dir
Added main menu (with incomplete arrow animation)
Split renderer.py code to settings.py and loader.py
Updated main menu to have an animated arrow
Added options menu that is hooked to the main menu
Added the game over menu that is hooked up to other menus
Added the pause menu that is hooked up to other menus
Added enter key now skips splash menu
Updated the options menu to have left/right option selection
Added telephone cutscene that is hooked up to office cutscene
Added jail cutscene that is hooked to office telephone cutscene
Added UI for scene; health bars
Updated animation.py to take into account orientation
Added a basic camera that follows an scene entity
Removed static updating methods in animations.py
Added walls to the first scene
Added static platforms to the first scene
Updated animations module to allow animation loop disabling
Added switches to the first scene
Added doors to the first scene; first scene is now complete
Added acceleration to the physics to resolve conservation issues
Removed acceleration as realistic physics makes it less fun
Completed the re-made Scene02
Added fixes for a tested and playable game until Scene02
Fixed horrible animation bug; animations include timings now
Changed IO loading to be fully handled in loader.py at boot time
Removed Blank<COMPONENT> classes due to dependency issues
Converted most images from JPG to PNG for better quality
Added a full screen option in the options menu
Fixed framerate not being imposed properly bug
Added a game win menu that is hooked up to the game
Fixed the character moving left and right finite state machine
Added editable speech bubbles to allow easier dialogue-ing
Added working dialogue for the first boss
Fixed a horrible moving platform physics bug (see comments)
Added a sweep attack for the boss
Completed the boss character with full AI logic
Merged slightly tweaked levels received from Gustavo
Added decoration class for scene entities
Added death screen that flashes red upon dying
Updated wall entities to construct as a single object
Added different types of dialogue bubbles
Upgraded the WrapTextLabel class used for speech bubbles
